name: discern
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to see, recognize, or understand something that is not clear: I could just discern a figure in the darkness. It is difficult to discern any pattern in these figures. Synonyms
distinguish
recognize
spot

Understanding and comprehending
Add to word list
Add to word list
to be able to see, recognize, understand, or decide something: He could discern the note of urgency in their voices. The exhibit is arranged in no important order that the viewer can discern.
